name: Outro
_source: #music mute fadeout
#background clearing
#music legacy
#gabrielle and emma
[OpenMidRight][LoadFace][0x102][OpenMidLeft][LoadFace][0x136][OpenMidLeft]ALRIGHT!!! You won, I tell you what
i know about whats going on here.[A]
[OpenMidRight]Talk smartly now i will burn you to a crisp
right were you stand if you try to run or[A]
cast a spell.[A]
[A][OpenMidRight]Ok first question why are you guys here
in Rosefall to begin with? Why did you[A]
guys teaming up with wrisiam?[A]
[OpenMidLeft]We were send to kill the princess of the
kistunes, we captured her not long ago.[A]
She been taken to a fort up that mountain.
And why we teamed up with Wrisiam... It's[A]
becau-- GAHHHH!!![A]
[OpenMidLeft][ClearFace][OpenMidRight]What was that? He just died right in front
of me! Layla can you sense anything that[A]
happened to him?[A]
[OpenFarRight][LoadFace][0x109][OpenFarRight]Hmmm... I sense some kind of magic
seal that was on him. I guessed it triggered[A]
when he value to umbra is no more or maybe
to stop him from talking. Look i see the magic[A]
seal on his heart.[A]
[OpenMidRight]He mentioned that the kistune princess
is up on that mountain outpost. If we move[A]
now we can make it before the noon.[A]
[OpenMidLeft][LoadFace][0x12C][OpenMidLeft]I heard from the townsfolk that they have
alot of their soilders guarding that outpost.[A]
The princess is going to be executed later
this night! So we need to move before[A]
it happened.[A]
[OpenMidRight]Maybe we can learn something from the
princess on what is happening to rosefall.[A]
Mostly... Why did they team up with wrisiam
to beginning with.[A]
[OpenFarRight]I can see what i can learn from this seal.
This could give us a clue on what could[A]
trigger it and we can stop it from happening
or even better to stop it in general.[A]
[OpenMidRight]Alright, I can't believe i am saying this
but bring the corpse with us. Burn it[A]
if it starts to reanimated or something.
(This is maybe the worst decision i ever made.)[A][OpenFarRight]Alright![A
][OpenMidRight]Defiants!! LETS MOVE OUT!!!! We got a
princess to save.[A]
[OpenMidLeft]LETS GO!![A]
#move to chapter 7
